name: Wishender
description:
STORY

Originally made for Ludum Dare 50.

A 20 minute, 2d, pixel art, bullet hell style game; in which you play as the last bit of light in the universe trying to survive against a constantly evolving dark figure that goes by "Wish Ender".

THEME

Delay the Inevitable, was the theme we had to follow. No matter what you do or how you play, you can not stop the inevitable that is Wish Ender.

GAMEPLAY

There is only one enemy, Wish Ender.  Wish Ender evolves after his former self is defeated. If Wish Ender is still alive when the timer hits 0:00, he will evolve to a greater form and have increased max health. Defeat him before the timer finishes!

CONTROLS InputActionWASD / Arrow KeysMove aroundMouseRotateLeft Mouse ButtonFireRight Mouse ButtonDash
